discoveries.title: The Tuning Fork — Hidden Speakeasy in Hamilton
discoveries.summary: Unmarked door on James St North. Cocktail bar with live jazz on Thursdays. Reservation recommended.
discoveries.whySteven: 20 min from Burlington. The kind of place you'd never find on Google. Great for a spontaneous Thursday night.

discoveries.title: The Pilgrim's Feast Table — All-You-Can-Eat Sushi
discoveries.summary: Korean-owned AYCE sushi spot in Burlington. Better quality than typical buffet places. Great value.
discoveries.whySteven: AYCE sushi is usually terrible. This is the exception. Good for when you want variety.

weeklyHighlight.reason: Best find this week — the kind of hidden gem you can't Google
